title: The split in the western soul, with Tim Freke
description: What is the lost spiritual knowledge that needs to be reintegrated? Tim Freke is a philosopher and has spent decades studying religion and mystical traditions, from Taoism to Gnosticism. He is the author of a number of bestselling books including Jesus and the Lost Goddess: http://timfreke.com/
